criteria.description: Are all facts, figures, and claims accurate and traceable to the article with no hallucinated information?
Does the summary capture all key points including the primary event, relevant figures, parties involved, and material implications?
Is the summary appropriately sized with no filler phrases, excessive hedging, or redundancy?
Does the summary lead with the most important takeaway and prioritises relevant information?
Is any commentary clearly distinguished from article facts, relevant, and insightful? If no commentary is included, is that appropriate?
Is the language professional, precise, and appropriate for senior banker communication?
